mapper.sql: ID, VEHICLE_ID, LICENSECARD, EQUIP_ID, EQUIP_TYPE,EQUIP_BRAND, SIM_PHONENO,SIM_ID, AUTO_LICENSECARD, IS_SHOW_AUTO_LICENSECARD, CARD_3G, DVR_NUMBER, CAMCORDER_MEMORY, OPER_ATTR, CORP_ID, TYPE_ID, LONGTIME_ELECTRIC, ACC, INSTALL_USER, INSTALL_DATE, IS_GUARD, GUARD_SENDNO, IS_SEND_MESSAGE, CHECK_LINE_TYPE, CAR_PICTURE, STATUS, OPENFIX_TYPE, STATUS_REMARK, REMARK, IS_FIXCAMERA, IS_DVR3GCAMERA, IS_TEMP, DELETE_FLAG, UPDATE_BY,DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_TIME,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as CREATE_TIME, PASSWORD
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM vehicle_maintain WHERE 1=1 AND CORP_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{corpId},'%') AND OPER_ATTR LIKE CONCAT('%',#{operAttr},'%') AND TYPE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{typeId},'%') AND DELETE_FLAG=#{deleteFlag} AND STATUS_REMARK LIKE CONCAT('%',#{statusRemark},'%') AND LICENSECARD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{licensecard},'%') AND SIM_PHONENO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{simPhoneno},'%') AND EQUIP_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{equipId},'%') AND STATUS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{status},'%') AND EQUIP_BRAND=#{equipBrand} AND EQUIP_TYPE=#{equipType}
AND INSTALL_DATE >= '${minCreateTime}'
AND INSTALL_DATE <= '${maxCreateTime}'
ORDER BY ID,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME DESC
mapper.delete: UPDATE VEHICLE_MAINTAIN SET DELETE_FLAG = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
